client
Class MandelbrotSetJob

java.lang.Object
  client.Job
      client.MandelbrotSetJob

public class MandelbrotSetJob
extends Job

A job to perform remote computation of Mandelbrot Set by splitting it up into smaller tasks of type task

Author:
Manasa Chandrasekhar, Kowshik Prakasam

Constructor Summary
MandelbrotSetJob(double lowerX, double lowerY, double edgeLength, int n, int iterLimit)
           
 
Method Summary
 void collectResults(Space space)
          Gathers Result objects from the compute space and caches them in a simple data structure that can be quickly retrieved by the client through the getAllResults() method
 void generateTasks(Space space)
          Decomposes the Mandelbrot Set computation into into a list of smaller tasks of type MandelbrotSetTask, each of which are executed remotely in a compute space (Space)
 int[][] getAllResults()
          Returns values cached by collectResults(Space space) method.

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

MandelbrotSetJob

public MandelbrotSetJob(double lowerX,
                        double lowerY,
                        double edgeLength,
                        int n,
                        int iterLimit)
Parameters:
lowerX - X-coordinate of the lower left corner of a square in the complex plane
lowerY - Y-coordinate of the lower left corner of a square in the complex plane
edgeLength - Edge length of the square in the complex plane, whose sides are parallel to the axes
n - Square region of the complex plane subdivided into n X n squares, each of which is visualized by 1 pixel
iterLimit - Defines when the representative point of a region is considered to be in the Mandelbrot set.
Method Detail

generateTasks

public void generateTasks(Space space)
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Decomposes the Mandelbrot Set computation into into a list of smaller tasks of type MandelbrotSetTask, each of which are executed remotely in a compute space (Space)

Specified by:
generateTasks in class Job
Parameters:
space - Compute space to which @{link tasks.MandelbrotSetTask MandelbrotSetTask} objects should be sent for execution
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
See Also:
Job

collectResults

public void collectResults(Space space)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Gathers Result objects from the compute space and caches them in a simple data structure that can be quickly retrieved by the client through the getAllResults() method

Specified by:
collectResults in class Job
Parameters:
space - Compute space containing the results obtained after remote execution of tasks
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
See Also:
Job

getAllResults

public int[][] getAllResults()
Returns values cached by collectResults(Space space) method. Each value in the returned array represents the colour of a pixel to be displayed on the screen to represent the Mandelbrot Set.

Specified by:
getAllResults in class Job
Returns:
An array that contains Mandelbrot Set integer values from all Result objects
See Also:
Job
